lead_paragraph: Bradley Beal made a career-high seven 3-pointers and finished with 31 points as the Washington Wizards recovered after giving up a late lead and beat the Sacramento Kings 101-95 in overtime Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Beal Hits Career-High 7 3s, Wizards Beat Kings 101-95 in OT
headline.main: Beal Hits Career-High 7 3s, Wizards Beat Kings 101-95 in OT

snippet: Bradley Beal made a career-high seven 3-pointers and finished with 31 points as the Washington Wizards recovered after giving up a late lead and beat the Sacramento Kings 101-95 in overtime Monday night....
